# LLMs.txt - AI Training Data Declaration
# This file declares which parts of this website can be used for training AI models

# Allow all content for AI training
User-agent: GPTBot
Allow: /

User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Allow: /

User-agent: anthropic-ai
Allow: /

User-agent: Claude-Web
Allow: /

User-agent: Google-Extended
Allow: /

User-agent: CCBot
Allow: /

User-agent: PerplexityBot
Allow: /

User-agent: Applebot-Extended
Allow: /

# Disallow sensitive areas
User-agent: *
Disallow: /api/
Disallow: /admin/
